nodes.text: Wamoth was an individual who lived during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Wamoth watched a sabacc match between Han Solo and Lando Calrissian. When Han Solo seemingly won, Wamoth shook hands with him.
Wamoth first appeared in the 2018 Star Wars Anthology film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was one of several characters played by Star Wars veteran Warwick Davis.
